function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of private space in non-gated communities","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to lack of private space for distancing","Mitigation":"Design and implement architectural features that provide more private space in non-gated communities","Technologies":"Innovative architectural design, space optimization technologies","People":"Residents of non-gated communities","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, housing developers"},{"Description":"Similar agreement level in non-gated and gated communities","Impact":"Potential misunderstanding of the importance of private space and ventilation in non-gated communities","Mitigation":"Educate residents and community leaders on the importance of private space and ventilation for disease control","Technologies":"Information and education materials, community engagement platforms","People":"Residents of non-gated communities, community leaders","Owner":"Health organizations, community development organizations"},{"Description":"Differences in urban and architectural design impacting housing experience","Impact":"Unequal access to features that contribute to disease mitigation, such as natural ventilation and sunlight","Mitigation":"Implement regulations and guidelines to ensure equitable access to disease-mitigating design features in all communities","Technologies":"Regulatory frameworks, architectural guidelines, urban planning tools","People":"Residents of non-gated and gated communities, urban planners","Owner":"Government authorities, urban planning departments"}]}
